text: The Bolognese is a small Italian dog breed that owes its name to the city of Bologna. The Bolognese is a toy dog with a delicate and fine build, a popular and adaptable companion and family dog, very adventurous. It has a curly coat that is pure white in color. *Bologneserspitz (extinct) The Bologneserspitz was a German breed of toy dog, mixed of Pomeranian and Bolognese dog. ==References== Category:Bichon Category:FCI breeds Category:Dog breeds originating in Italy Category:Rare dog breeds
title: Bolognese (dog)
